description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Cell Life is a life simulator based on Conway's Game of Life.  There are a variety of game modes where you can explore Life by creating random simulations of anywhere from 100 cells to over 10000 cells at once, view a pattern library of amazing Life creations, experiment to create your own custom patterns and watch them evolve, or even use your entire TV screen as a simulation in screensaver mode!
